purpose: To educate individuals on Generative AI techniques and tools, ranging from ML fundamentals to advanced topics like LLMs and AI agents
principle: Provides structured tutorials and practical exercises using Jupyter Notebooks to teach various AI and ML concepts
reusability: Open-source educational content that can be reused and adapted for different learning paths; supports integration with various AI frameworks
limitations: Requires a basic understanding of Python and machine learning concepts; self-paced format may not suit all learners
name: AI-Bootcamp
description: Self-paced bootcamp on Generative AI. Tutorials on ML fundamentals, LLMs, RAGs, LangChain, LangGraph, Fine-tuning Llama 3 & AI Agents (CrewAI)
highlight: Comprehensive self-paced bootcamp with tutorials on cutting-edge Generative AI techniques and tools
